summary: This mod forces dragons to immediately land on ground when dragonrend shout use on them and even forces them to crash on land regardless for their health status thus making dragonrend the more powerful shout.
descriptionHtml:
Improved Dragonrend Shout

The original Dragonrend shout just causes Dragons to safely land when they feel like it and sometimes they keeps flying and  flies away so far that you don\'t have the time to chase after it.
Also  at times this shout don\'t seem to work at all when the dragons keep flying away,but not any more.

This mod forces dragons to immediately land on ground when dragonrend shout use on them and even forces them to crash landing  regardless for their health status thus making dragonrend the more powerful shout.

Fully Compatible with any mods.
author: Praveen
